data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The longer you can stay at a given location and the more opportunities you have to return will make your service more beneficial for you and the community you serve. It ____ you ____ build ____ relationships ____ make ____ personally ____ to ____ culture, people ____ place ____ are ____. It also gives the people you are serving a greater chance to learn and understand the culture that you come from.
data.partBlankContent: The longer you can stay at a given location and the more opportunities you have to return will make your service more beneficial for you and the community you serve. It all___ you t_ build str___ relationships th__ make y__ personally conn_____ to t__ culture, people a__ place y__ are visi____. It also gives the people you are serving a greater chance to learn and understand the culture that you come from.
data.fullContent: The longer you can stay at a given location and the more opportunities you have to return will make your service more beneficial for you and the community you serve. It allows you to build strong relationships that make you personally connected to the culture, people and place you are visiting. It also gives the people you are serving a greater chance to learn and understand the culture that you come from.
data.answer: 你在一个地点停留的时间越长，你返回的机会就越多，你所提供的服务对你自己和你所服务的社区就越有益。它能让你建立起牢固的人际关系，让你与你要参观的文化、人们和地方建立起紧密的联系。它也给你所服务的人民一个更好的机会去学习和理解你来自的文化。
